comment: I'm happy to hear this, but I don't have confidence in Trump's judgment. We could end up with someone worse. Besides, if Trump starts making good decisions in Oct/Nov, I'm going to be suspicious that this turn in strategy is just a cynical ploy to get disaffected rightwingers back on the Trump Train. He could continue to screw us over after the midterms.
